title: Love Times - Novel Updates
tags: Dense Protagonist   Long-distance Relationship   Office Romance   Senpai-Kouhai Relationship   Slow Romance   Straight Uke
author: Konohara Narise
description: 'I love you' - Arita hears the confession from his junior, Hirose. Arita is shocked to know that the younger junior has been in love, and he is the love interest. As you begin to comprehend, everything is just hot and painful words. Non-pained facial expressions show occasionally in contact with a cold attitude, always in a calm Hirose, Arita starts to open your heart, but little by little -.>
